note: Jeolla is the heartland of Korean cuisine. Adding Damyang Juknokwon and Boseong Green Tea Fields requires 1 extra day (Jeonju to Damyang 40 min, Damyang to Boseong 1.5 hrs). Gwangju's 5.18 memorial sites and the Asia Culture Center are 1 hour from Jeonju. The ultimate Yeosu night experience is the combination of the night cable car + Dolsan Park + Nangman Pocha.
